alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Graves; Hickman (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 12:26PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Fulton, southeastern Hickman and southwestern Graves Counties through NOON CDT... At 1125 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fulton, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Fulton, southeastern Hickman and southwestern Graves Counties, including the following locations... Dukedom. This includes Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 2 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
